Package app.manager

Class SongManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.manager.SongManager
  • public class SongManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The SongManager class serves as a primary interface for interacting with the song library, playlists, and player functionalities, as well as managing presentation-related tasks.

      • addSongToPlaylist

        public boolean addSongToPlaylist​(java.lang.String songName,
                                 java.lang.String playlistName)
        Adds a song to a specified playlist by song name.
        Parameters:
        songName - The name of the song to add.
        playlistName - The name of the playlist to which the song will be added.
        Returns:
        true if the song is added successfully; false otherwise.

      • addSongToPlaylist

                                 java.lang.String playlistName)
        Adds a song to a specified playlist by Song object.
        Parameters:
        song - The Song object to add.
        playlistName - The name of the playlist to which the song will be added.
        Returns:
        true if the song is added successfully; false otherwise.

      • removePlaylist

        public boolean removePlaylist​(java.lang.Object input)
        Removes a playlist from the playlist library by name or Playlist object.
        Parameters:
        input - Either the name of the playlist (String) or the Playlist object itself.
        Returns:
        true if the playlist was successfully removed, false otherwise.

      • loadFromCSV

        public void loadFromCSV​(java.lang.String fileName)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Loads song and playlist data from a specified CSV file. Displays a success message upon successful load or an error message if loading fails.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the CSV file to load data from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an issue with reading the file, such as an invalid path or file format.

      • saveToCSV

        public void saveToCSV​(java.lang.String fileName)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the current song and playlist data to a specified CSV file. Displays a success message upon successful save or an error message if saving fails.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the CSV file to save data to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an issue with writing to the file, such as lack of write permissions.
